sections.purpose: To collect, digitize, and analyze physiological data from experimental setups.
sections.scope: Applicable to automated recording in cardiovascular and neuropharmacology.
procedure: Connect transducers and sensors to the acquisition modules.
Power ON the system and start the acquisition software.
Calibrate each channel using known standards.
Start data recording before initiating the experiment.
Monitor real-time displays and save data at regular intervals.
After experiment, export data for analysis and archive raw files.
precautions: Use shielded cables to minimize electrical interference.
